item.title: UBS Revamps Leadership of Asset Management Unit
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- UBS Group AG is adjusting the leadership of its asset management division, the latest changes at the Swiss bank as it progresses with the integration of Credit Suisse. The changes are designed to help integrate and streamline the division’s product offering and reduce its cost base a...
